name: miscellaneously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a number of different ways that are not usually connected with each other: The book contains a lot of interesting information, but it is too miscellaneously heaped together. She works in a miscellaneously decorated bar in the city centre.
More examplesFewer examplesThe garden has been miscellaneously fertilized for many years.There was a huge pile of miscellaneously arranged material in the office waiting to be filed.The accidents that were reported were dealt with miscellaneously.
